Job Posting:171829 - Position: F25 Software Engineer Intern 171829B E1 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 08/15/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 08/11/2025 10:32 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country CareQuilt 18 Woodlawn Ave Ottawa K1S 2S9 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Software Engineer Intern 171829B E1 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 4 or 8 months Fully Remote To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description CareQuilt 20.5 per hour for 35 Major List CareQuilt is transforming the elderly care industry by building a modern, tech-first solution that ensures high-quality care while addressing the increasing demand for elderly support. The industry today is outdated, inefficient, and unable to meet the needs of our aging population. We're here to change that. Why Join Us? · Work alongside former FAANG engineers. · Build AI-driven solutions, web platforms, and mobile apps. · Gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced, mission-driven startup. · Make a real impact in an industry that affects millions of families Job Requirements Job Requirements & Qualifications · Develop and optimize AI-driven applications for elderly care. · Build and improve web and mobile platforms to enhance customer experience. · Collaborate with experienced engineers to design scalable, high-performance systems. · Solve real-world problems in healthcare and make real impact to peoples lives. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions ?
